page.title: 09SATURDAY LEISURE
page.content: ON SATURDAY I GET UP WHEN I WANT TO, I READ FOR A WHILE AND THEN I GO DOWN STAIRS TO WATCH THE TELLY. LATER I HAVE BREAKFAST WHICH IS SCRAMBLED EGG ON TOAST AND A CUP OF TEA.WE TIDY UP THE HOUSE THEN I GET DRESSED TO TAKE TWO LITTLE BOYS OUT,THEIR NAMES ARE NATHAN AND DEAN.WE GO TO ALL THE PARKS AROUND US. I HAVE TO GET THEM BACK BEFORE LUNCH BECAUSE THEIR DAD TAKES THEM OUT. I USUALLY HAVE A SNACK AND THEN I DO MY HOMEWORK. THERE IS NOTHING TO DO SO I GO UPSTAIRS TO READ.IN THE EVENING I WATCH THE PROGRAMMES AND FILMS ON T.V. FOR THE EVENING MEAL WE HAVE SOMETHING LIKE SALAD OR BEANS ON TOAST. IF THERE IS NOTHING ON TELLY WE PLAY SCRABBLE OR MONOPOLY. WE GO TO BED WHEN WE ARE TIRED.
